item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @The_roy6 The roy6
item.description:

[code]case 2478:
if(actionTimer == 15)
{
sendMessage(“You get some runes”);
addSkillXP(250 * playerLevel[20], 20);
setAnimation(1978);
addItem(554, 10);
addItem(555, 10);
addItem(556, 10);
addItem(557, 10);
addItem(558, 10);
addItem(559, 10);
addItem(560, 10);

addItem(563, 10);
addItem(4278, 10);

updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

case 4463:
if(actionTimer == 6) {
addSkillXP(15000, 17);
addItem(995, 500000);
sendMessage(“You Steal 500k”);
}
break;

case 4462:
if(actionTimer == 6) {
addSkillXP(15000, 17);
addItem(995, 750000);
sendMessage(“You Steal 750k”);
}
break;

case 4460:
if(actionTimer == 6) {
addSkillXP(15000, 17);
addItem(995, 1000000);
sendMessage(“You Steal 1m”);
}
break; [/code]

and if something is wrong in them plz fix because they wont work =/
